a trial of , both in heat and cold ; for the Summer
September next ; of the poſsibility of which , I have my doubts ; but suppose
will not come to England , this season
believe me , with kindest regards to Mr : Dickenson and my Cousin , your sincerely obliged & affectionate Jane Holman . 50 Mortimer Street London Feb
know how it is . Mrs : Dickenson Leighton House Leighton Buzzard Bedfordshire Single Mrs Holman 1809
